document.title: A Program of Adult Education for the Clearfork Valley Community
document.abstract:
(From The Problem)

The Clearfork Valley Community has a problem in that it does not have an organized program of adult education, but it is thought that some possibilities are present whereby a program could be initiated. Actually, the overall problem of the community is to secure an adult education program, but there are more specific problems to be dealt with. These rather basic problems will deal with how the leaders of the proposed program can go about arousing interest to get it started and the supplying of financial and material aid and moral support to keep it operating from day to day, month to month and year to year.

field.name: advisor2
field.value: B. H. Story, Owen E. Cole
